resources.string: This app lets you enjoy your chat or video streaming without firewall timeout problem on Fortinet within GLA University\'s Network.
Let\'s get social with the dev ;)
Coded with ðŸ”¥ + ðŸ§ for GLAU
Rate the app on Play Store

Some of the devices might not allow the service to run all the time due to background computation restrictions by manufacturers, for instance you may white list the app from Settings > Battery > Battery Optimisation > 'Don't Optimise this app' 

 OR 

 MI users may whitelist the app from Security App > Permissions > AutoStart > 'Allow this app' 


 *Look for similar settings, varies with device!*
